articles.title: Giant Australian birds which lived alongside emus may have become extinct due to slow breeding patterns and belated sexual maturity - Moree Champion
articles.description: Dromornis the “thunder bird” lived 7 million years ago and stood 3 metres tall and may have become extinct due to belated sexual maturity.
